txt.en: Crude defences can be found at the entrances to Utterby.\n\nYou should secretly sabotage the Jangovar's defences.
You have been sent to ensure that Utterby's defences are prepared for a dwarf attack.
Tuhâl would like to speak with you.\n\nYou should talk to Tuhâl.
You should talk to Otkóz. who can be found inside Utterby.

'Chayasír, the dwarves may launch a retaliatory strike after our raid on Hammerstead. I need someone to go check that our defences are in order. You have proved trustworthy enough, so I am sending you. Get to it.'
'You know what I am thinking, friend? That this would be a good opportunity for sabotage! While we 'check' these defences, perhaps we should also weaken them, very subtly, of course.'

'So? Is it done?'

You tell the Jangovar that the defences should hold against a dwarf attack.

'Good. I will call for you if I need anything else.'
